text: The Kardashian clan has fired back in the ongoing legal feud with Blac Chyna who has accused the family of defaming her and sabotaging her now - canceled reality show Rob & Chyna. In new court documents obtained by DailyMail. com, Kris Jenner, Rob and Kim Kardashian - who are named as defendants in the suit - have dismissed the reality star's claims as'bald conclusions that have no factual support.'Chyna, real name Angela Renee White, first filed the suit in October, blaming the family for cancellation of her reality show, which was not renewed for a second season after 2016. She claimed E! and production team, as well as herself and Rob, were all on board and ready to shoot a second season before the show was axed
